subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin scored twice, James Neal had four assists and the host Pittsburgh Penguins clinched a playoff spot with a 5-1 victory over the Nashville Predators.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin scored twice, James Neal had four assists and the host Pittsburgh Penguins clinched a playoff spot with a 5-1 victory over the Nashville Predators.
